title: Allumette
desc: A story about love, sacrifice and a deep bond between a girl and her mother

title: Battlefield 1
desc: FPS set during World War I. Players can make use of World War I weapons.

title: Battlefield 4
desc: FPS set during a fictional war "War of 2020;" depicts the tension between Russia and USA

title: Beyond: Two Souls
desc: Live the life of Jodie Holmes, a young woman who possesses supernatural powers through her psychic link to a mysterious invisible entity. As a small child, Jodie Holmes became a government lab rat due to her strange psychic powers caused by her link to an incorporeal psychic entity known as Aiden.

title: Detroit Become Human
desc: What happens when we have human-like AI robots as caretakers, police, a family member?

title: Eagle Flight
desc: You get to become an eagle and feel the simulation of flying!

title: Fallout 4
desc: Set in post-apocalyptic world after a nuclear explosion; the player explores this dystopian world through quests and building towns

title: Farpoint
desc: a virtual reality space adventure set on a hostile alien planet.

title: Gary the Gull
desc: Gary the Gull is an VR Animated Interactive Short Film where you are part of the story! Respond to Gary's questions -- nodding, shaking your head, talking -- and see how your decisions affect how the story plays out.

title: Grand Theft Auto 5
desc: Running out of options, the crew risks everything in a series of daring and dangerous heists that could set them up for life.

title: Heavy Rain
desc: game revolves around a plot and narrative threads that explore a moral proposition. You assume the role of multiple characters with very different backgrounds, motivations, and skills in a world where each player decision affects what will follow.

title: Horizon Zero Dawn
desc: The story is set in the 31st century, in a world where humans have regressed to primitive tribal societies as a result of some unspecified calamity. Their technologically advanced predecessors are vaguely remembered as the "Old Ones". Large robotic creatures known merely as "machines" now dominate the Earth.

title: Journey
desc: Journey's story is told wordlessly through gameplay and using cutscenes. The player's character begins on a sand dune in a seemingly endless desert.

title: Life is Strange
desc: Life Is Strange follows the exploits of 18-year old Max Caulfield, a high school senior who learns she has the power to rewind time when she saves her childhood friend, Chloe Price, from being killed.

title: Mafia 3
desc: After the murder of his surrogate family at the hands of the Italian mafia, Vietnam War veteran Lincoln Clay seeks vengeance on those who took away the only thing that mattered to him.

title: Metal Gear Solid: The Phantom Pain
desc: In the aftermath of the events of Ground Zeroes and the destruction of Militaires Sans Fronti√®res falls into a coma. Nine years later, he awakens and helps lead a new mercenary group, Diamond Dogs.

title: Octodad: The Dadliest Catch
desc: You play as an octopus that conceals his identity to be a human dad

title: Playstation VR Worlds
desc: Visit different worlds in VR

title: Shadow of the Colossus
desc: Protagonist Wander's goal is to resurrect the maiden Mono by destroying the giant colossi

title: SuperHot
desc: Superhot sets the player in a minimalistic environment, taking out hostile attackers that are trying to kill them

title: The Walking Dead: The Telltale Series (Collection)
desc: Lee is on his way to prison, until he realizes that there is a zombie apocalypse. Will he and the little girl Clementine survive this ordeal?

title: The Walking Dead: The Telltale Series
desc: Lee is on his way to prison, until he realizes that there is a zombie apocalypse. Will he and the little girl Clementine survive this ordeal?

title: Tomb Raider: Definitive Edition
desc: Lara set out on her first expedition aboard the ship Endurance, with the intention of finding the lost kingdom of Yamatai. By her suggestion and against Whitman's advice, the expedition ventures into the Dragon's Triangle.

title: Uncharted: The Lost Legacy
desc: In India, treasure hunter Chloe Frazer searches for the legendary tusk of Ganesh, the son of Hindu god Shiva, who lost the tusk while defending his father's temple. Chloe's own father was killed by bandits while searching for the tusk. Chloe slips past insurgents and meets up with mercenary Nadine Ross. They sneak into the office of the insurgents' leader, Asav, who wants to use the tusk to rally India into a civil war. Chloe and Nadine steal a map pointing toward the tusk within the ancient Hoysala Empire and a disc that acts as a key.

title: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
desc: Link needs to save the Hyrule Kingdom and Princess Zelda from destruction

title: Mario Kart 8 Deluxe
desc: Play as Mario characters and race against your friends!

title: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2
playable mode: single player, offline multiplayer, online multiplayer

title: LA Noire

desc: You are Commander Shepard creating a peaceful universe for all alien species; includes Mass Effect 1, 2, and 3

title: Portal 2
desc: Chell needs to escape from the Aperture Science research lab by solving puzzles

desc: John Marstonis taken from his family by Bureau of Investigation agents Edgar Ross and his partner, Archer Fordham, and will only be granted amnesty when he brings the remaining members of his old gang to justice.

title: The Sims 3
desc: Build your own house, family, and a community of Sims characters!

desc: The player is introduced in a small basement office by two accountants  through a phone call as a candidate for a new "virtual reality accounting" experiment, which supposedly increases efficiency in accounting

desc: A story about love, sacrifice and a deep bond between a girl and her mother

title: Blocks

column10: Your job as immigration inspector is to control the flow of people entering the Arstotzkan side of Grestin from Kolechia.

desc: Chell needs to escape from the Aperture Science research lab by solving puzzles
